title: A facile strategy of “laser-direct-writing” to develop self-supported Ni30B70–Ti catalysts for boosted and durable alkaline oxygen evolution
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00230J, Paper
Yiming Gao, Shengli Zhu, Zhenduo Cui, Zhaoyang Li, Shuilin Wu, Zhonghui Gao, Wence Xu, Meiqing Guo, Yanqin Liang, Hui Jiang
A Ni30B70–Ti catalyst for seawater splitting was designed via ball milling and laser direct writing technology. The OER overpotential of Ni30B70–Ti was 370 mV at a current density of 50 mA cm−2, 260 mV lower than that of the commercial Ni mesh.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
